context_bundle.summary: Fallback communication methods when primary AHK delivery fails. File-based messaging, taskbar flash monitoring, and manual notification patterns.

onboarding.quick_start: If AHK fails: write_file message to C:\Temp\DC_TO_VSCC.txt, monitor_taskbar_flash for VSCC activity, or use existing coordination files
common_patterns: Taskbar monitoring: detect when VSCC becomes active
Manual handoff: DC notes task in bootstrap for VSCC to read on next session
known_errors: File-based messaging requires manual checking by target agent
Race conditions if both agents write simultaneously
